PAGE_MISSING_FILE_FOLDER.HEADER: Missing / Incorrect path for File(s) / Folder(s) for the page '{0}'
PAGE_MISSING_FILE_FOLDER.FOLDER_PATH_MISSING: The folder path '{0}' does not exist for the file '{1}'.
PAGE_MISSING_FILE_FOLDER.FILE_NOT_IN_FOLDER: File '{0}' does not exist in the path '{1}' for the file '{2}'.

WIDGET_MISSING_FILE_FOLDER.HEADER: Missing / Incorrect path for File(s) / Folder(s) for the widget '{0}'
WIDGET_MISSING_FILE_FOLDER.FOLDER_PATH_MISSING: The folder path '{0}' does not exist for the file '{1}'.
WIDGET_MISSING_FILE_FOLDER.FILE_NOT_IN_FOLDER: File '{0}' does not exist in the path '{1}' for the file '{2}'.

FORCE_DEVICE_XPANEL.MESSAGE: forceDeviceXPanel must be set to true for ZoomRoomControl project.

INVALID_PAGE_NAMES.MESSAGE: Page name '{0}' not matching with its corresponding file name '{1}'.

INVALID_WIDGET_NAMES.MESSAGE: Widget name '{0}' not matching with its corresponding file name '{1}'.

INVALID_PAGE_FOLDER_PATH.MESSAGE: Page Fullpath '{0}' is not a valid path for pages.

INVALID_WIDGET_FOLDER_PATH.MESSAGE: Widget Fullpath '{0}' is not a valid path for widgets.

PAGE_NAME_MISSING.MESSAGE: Page name '{0}' param does not exist.

WIDGET_NAME_MISSING.MESSAGE: Widget name '{0}' param does not exist.

DEFAULT_VIEW_INVALID.ERROR_MESSAGE: There is no page in the project-config.json file with the $defaultView '{0}'.
DEFAULT_VIEW_INVALID.ERROR_MESSAGE_NO_NAVIGATION: The page defined in $defaultView '{0}' does not have a navigation node.
DEFAULT_VIEW_INVALID.WARNING_MESSAGE: $defaultView is empty in the project-config.json file.

SELECTED_THEME_INCORRECT.THEME_NOT_IN_LIST: Selected theme '{0}' is not available in the list of themes.
SELECTED_THEME_INCORRECT.THEME_NAMING_STYLE: Selected theme '{0}' and theme name in the list of themes '{1}' have a case mismatch.

REPEATED_THEME_NAME_IN_ARRAY.MESSAGE: Theme name '{0}' is repeated in the themes array.

ATLEAST_ONE_MENU.MESSAGE: For 'horizontal' or 'vertical' menu, there must be at least one page with navigation.

ICON_POSITION_VERTICAL.MESSAGE: Icon position is applicable for 'horizontal' menu. The menuOrientation defined in project-config.json file is 'vertical' menu. The iconPosition will not be applied to the navigation icons.

VERTICAL_MENU_HEADER_AVAILABLE.MESSAGE: The header cannot be hidden for 'vertical' menu orientation.

EMPTY_PAGES_ARRAY.MESSAGE: There are no pages available in the project. At least one page is required for the project to run.

PAGE_AND_WIDGET_DUPLICATES.HEADER: Same Page name and Widget name
PAGE_AND_WIDGET_DUPLICATES.MESSAGE: Page name and Widget name are the same for page '{0}' and '{1}'.

HEADER_COMPONENT_MISMATCH.ERROR_MESSAGE_NAVIGATION: The page used in 'header -> $component' has navigation node. This node must not be present.
HEADER_COMPONENT_MISMATCH.ERROR_MESSAGE_STANDALONE_TRUE: The page used in 'header -> $component' has standAloneView set to true. This node must be set to false.
HEADER_COMPONENT_MISMATCH.ERROR_MESSAGE_PAGE_MISSING: The page used in 'header -> $component' does not exist.

FOOTER_COMPONENT_MISMATCH.ERROR_MESSAGE_NAVIGATION: The page used in 'footer -> $component' has navigation node. This node must not be present.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_MISMATCH.ERROR_MESSAGE_STANDALONE_TRUE: The page used in 'footer -> $component' has standAloneView set to true. This node must be set to false.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_MISMATCH.ERROR_MESSAGE_PAGE_MISSING: The page used in 'footer -> $component' does not exist.
